fields.name: Containers
fields.description: List of container definitions for the Container App.

fields.name: InitContainers
fields.description: List of specialized containers that run before app containers.

fields.name: RevisionSuffix
fields.description: User friendly suffix that is appended to the revision name

fields.name: Scale
fields.description: Scaling properties for the Container App.

fields.name: ServiceBinds
fields.description: List of container app services bound to the app

fields.name: TerminationGracePeriodSeconds
fields.description: Optional duration in seconds the Container App Instance needs to terminate gracefully. Value must be non-negative integer. The value zero indicates stop immediately via the kill signal (no opportunity to shut down). If this value is nil, the default grace period will be used instead. Set this value longer than the expected cleanup time for your process. Defaults to 30 seconds.

fields.name: Volumes
fields.description: List of volume definitions for the Container App.
